title: Running Wild
description: Cassandra Wild is on the run from a deranged psychopath while she fights to stay alive during the zombie apocalypse. After being kidnapped, injured, and thrown together with a new band of misfits, things get more complicated, and it takes all of her strength and courage to survive in a world gone completely mad.  Cover by maeidesign.com  This is a teen/young adult title that contains some language, violence, and mild sexual situations. Recommended for ages sixteen and up.
author: Kristen Middleton
